# Popularity of countries in the New York Times

## Overview
The dataset shows how much attention different countries received from the NY Times in different years. As a measurement I use the number of articles published in the NY Times (and attributed to the NY Times) where a particular country is mentioned.

## Source
This dataset was created via NY Times API (https://developer.nytimes.com/), article_search. Source code and queries: https://github.com/ansakoy/api_xtractors/tree/master/countries_nytimes

## Methodology
The queries were based on a list of 248 countries and territories.
They only consider articles attributed to the NY Times, ignoring articles by Reuters or AP also published by NY Times.

If a country has an ambiguous name, like China or Turkey or Georgia, the query only includes indirect, although likely references to the country (such as Chinese, Beijing, Ankara or Tbilisi).
